title: Francium
desc:
Post 1552
- Currently, this pure Francium is in kerosene (also known as a bomb that isn't going off).
- When you play this card, choose 1 person that is right beside you in the turn order, They will be blasted with 6 cards (you take the Francium out and have it react to air).
- The people right beside that person will draw 3 cards.
- Everyone that gains cards through this card gains <:impact:1106704414225485894> resistance.
